// INSTRUCTIONS: Copy this file to .vscode/settings.json in your project root to enable MCP coordination server for GitHub Copilot
// NOTE: Ensure coordination server is running: npm run dev (HTTP) and npm run mcp (MCP) in separate terminals
// PORT: Coordination Server HTTP: 3456 | MCP Server: stdio

coordination.// PURPOSE: Enable GitHub Copilot to participate in coordinated multi-AI development
coordination.// STARTUP: MCP server uses stdio transport - connects automatically when defined here

env.// COORDINATION_SERVER_URL: Where MCP server communicates with HTTP API
env.// USE_MOCKS: true for development/testing, false for production with real services
env.// DEBUG_MCP: Enable debug logging from MCP server
env.// LOG_LEVEL: error, warn, info, debug - controls verbosity
env.// MCP_TIMEOUT_MS: How long to wait for tool responses (ms). Increase if network is slow
env.// MCP_MAX_RETRIES: How many times to retry tool invocations on failure

coordination.// alwaysAllow: Tools that don't require user confirmation before execution
coordination.// disabled: Set to true to disable this server without removing configuration
coordination.// timeout: VS Code timeout for tool invocations (ms)

// COPILOT CHAT SETTINGS: Configure Copilot Chat behavior for coordination
// EDITOR SETTINGS: Recommended settings for working with coordination
